item.title: 人工智能社交媒体预示着人工智能朋友的未来
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，库尔特-瓦格纳（Kurt Wagner）将探讨 Character.AI 推出基于人工智能的新闻源对社交媒体的未来意味着什么。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Kurt Wagner considers what Character.AI’s introduction of an AI-based feed means for the future of social media.】

item.title: 特朗普关税令非洲竭力保护重要出口产品
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普 8 月 1 日的最后期限到来之前，没有一个国家获得贸易协定，非洲国家正急于减轻特朗普关税的打击，这威胁到这个拥有世界上许多最贫穷人口的地区的一切，从肯尼亚的茶叶到利比亚的石油。【原文：African nations are rushing to soften the blow of Donald Trump’s tariffs after none were granted a trade pact before his Aug. 1 deadline, threatening everything from Kenyan tea to Libyan oil in a region home to many of the poorest people on earth.】

item.title: 数字游民正在改变麦德林的住房总量
item.description: 针对长期游客的新开发项目旨在缓解城市化问题—。【原文：New developments targeted at longer-term visitors aim to relieve gentrification—in style.】

item.title: 三方意见分歧迫使再次投票后英国央行再次降息
item.description: 英国央行将利率下调至两年多来的最低点，这一决定比预期的更为接近，通胀率达到 4% 的前景与疲软的就业市场形成了鲜明对比。【原文：The Bank of England cut interest rates to the lowest in over two years in a closer-than-expected decision that pitted the prospect of inflation hitting 4% against a weakening jobs market.】

item.title: 长江基建即将与国家电网签订价值 20 亿英镑的液化天然气终端项目协议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，长江基建控股有限公司（CK Infrastructure Holdings Ltd.）已成为英国液化天然气终端项目的主要竞标者，该项目价值约 20 亿英镑（27 亿美元）。【原文：CK Infrastructure Holdings Ltd. has emerged as the lead bidder for a UK liquefied natural gas terminal valued at about £2 billion ($2.7 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 台积电商业机密外泄，日本东京电子岌岌可危
item.description: 台湾方面对台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：A Taiwanese investigation into the possible theft of chip technology at Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. is putting a low-profile, lesser-known tech linchpin in Japan under unusual scrutiny.】

item.title: 新兴市场因关税消息和俄罗斯会谈加速反弹
item.description: 周四，新兴市场资产反弹，因为全球贸易的积极信号和乌克兰朝着停战方向迈出的步伐提振了市场情绪。【原文：Emerging-market assets rallied on Thursday after positive signals on global trade and steps toward a truce in Ukraine lifted sentiment.】

item.title: 叙利亚将以 40 亿美元购买空客喷气机并扩建机场
item.description: 叙利亚计划利用新的空中客车 SE 飞机重建其航空业，并重建其主要机场，以配合该国在多年内战后的重新开放。【原文：Syria plans to rebuild its aviation industry with new Airbus SE aircraft and the reconstruction of its main airport as the country reopens after years of civil war.】

item.description:

item.title: 继乌克兰星链（Starlink）交易之后，Veon 又盯上了哈萨克斯坦的卫星服务
item.description: 继在乌克兰与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的星链公司（Starlink Inc.【原文：Veon Ltd. may expand its satellite-powered mobile services to Kazakhstan, which would be its second market after the company struck a similar deal in Ukraine with Elon Musk’s Starlink Inc.】

item.title: 塞尔维亚保持利率稳定，通胀再次加速
item.description: 塞尔维亚中央银行连续第 11 个月维持利率不变，通胀风险不断上升，经济增长疲软的压力越来越大。【原文：Serbia’s central bank kept interest rates unchanged for an 11th month with growing inflation risks taking precedence over weaker economic growth.】

item.title: 墨西哥的辛鲍姆公司在玉米粉财富的年轻继承人身上找到了不寻常的盟友
item.description:
阿尔塔格拉西亚-戈麦斯-谢拉为总统 克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）的企业伸出援手。【原文：

Altagracia Gómez Sierra reaches out to business for President Claudia Sheinbaum. 

】

item.title: 特朗普将签署命令放宽 401（k）计划中的私人资产途径
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统将于周四签署一项行政命令，旨在允许私募股权、房地产、加密货币和其他另类资产进入 401（k）计划，这对于那些希望从这些退休账户中获取大约 12.5 万亿美元资金的行业来说是一个重大胜利。【原文：President Donald Trump will sign an executive order Thursday that aims to allow private equity, real estate, cryptocurrency and other alternative assets in 401(k)s, a major victory for industries looking to tap some of the roughly $12.5 trillion held in those retirement accounts.】

item.title: 加拿大希望在北冰洋港口向欧洲运输天然气和商品
item.description: 加拿大政府正在努力开发哈得逊湾上一个偏远的北部港口，作为出口天然气、钾肥、油菜籽和其他商品的渠道，以减少对美国的经济依赖。【原文：The Canadian government is looking hard at developing a remote northern port on Hudson Bay as a conduit for exporting natural gas, potash, canola and other commodities as the country tries to reduce its economic dependence on the US.】

item.title: 威兹航空总裁给自己两年时间实现扭亏为盈
item.description: 威兹航空控股公司（Wizz Air Holdings Plc）的掌门人给了自己两年的时间来扭转这家低成本航空公司的局面，并在经历了一系列挫折（包括从中东地区黯然撤退）之后重新赢得投资者的青睐。【原文：The head of Wizz Air Holdings Plc has given himself two years to turn around the low-cost airline and win back investors after a run of setbacks, including a humbling retreat from the Middle East.】

item.title: Altice 将在葡萄牙大修中关闭五家公司
item.description: 作为葡萄牙最大电信公司提高效率行动的一部分，Altice Portugal SA 正在裁减五家公司约 1500 名员工。【原文：Altice Portugal SA is winding down five companies with about 1,500 employees as part of an efficiency drive at the country’s biggest telecommunications company.】

item.title: 部长称法国贸易数据向欧盟发出 "警告信号
item.description: 法国贸易部长表示，最新出口数据敲响了警钟，因为美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税威胁到了世界经济。【原文：France’s trade minister said the latest export data are setting off alarm bells as US President Donald Trump’s tariffs threaten the world economy.】

item.title: 美国银行认为被打压的保险股有望反弹
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）认为，美国主要保险公司股价的惨淡走势似乎即将结束，因为有吸引力的估值和利润反弹可能会吸引投资者回流。【原文：A brutal stretch for shares of major US insurance companies looks set to end, according to Bank of America Corp., as attractive valuations and a profit rebound may lure back investors.】

item.title: 美国加征关税后，瑞士政治家力促取消 F-35 战斗机交易
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对瑞士征收世界上最严厉的关税之后，瑞士各党派政治家正在寻求取消从美国国防企业洛克希德-马丁公司订购的三十几架 F-35A 战斗机。【原文：Swiss politicians across parties are seeking to cancel an order of three dozen F-35A fighter jets from US defense conglomerate Lockheed Martin Corp after President Donald Trump imposed some of the world’s harshest levies on the country.】

item.title: 特朗普与拉马福萨就南非-美国贸易问题发表讲话，计划举行更多会谈
item.description: 南非总统西里尔-拉马福萨（Cyril Ramaphosa）和美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周三通了电话，这一天正是华盛顿对南非输美商品征收 30% 关税的前一天。【原文：South African President Cyril Ramaphosa and US President Donald Trump held a phone call Wednesday, a day before Washington’s 30% tariffs on the nation’s goods entering the US kicked in.】

item.title: 美国人为特朗普的关税买单只是时间问题
item.description:
无论是以价格上涨、质量下降还是选择减少的形式出现，关税都不可能永远隐藏下去。【原文：

Whether they come in the form of higher prices, lower quality or fewer options, tariffs can’t hide forever.

】

item.title: 中国无人机制造商大疆被华盛顿拒之门外，美国市场岌岌可危
item.description: 由中国人拥有和经营的大疆创新科技公司（DJI Technologies）正面临着在年底前保住其美国业务的最后期限，而这家无人机制造商正努力争取华盛顿方面的任何人倾听它的声音。【原文：Chinese-owned and operated DJI Technologies is up against an end-of-year deadline to keep its US business alive, and the drone maker is struggling to get anyone in Washington to listen.】

item.title: Banxico 将推出更小的四分之一降幅
item.description: 在经济增长降温、核心通胀率居高不下的情况下，墨西哥央行可能将放缓货币政策宽松步伐，降息四分之一个百分点。【原文：Mexico’s central bank will likely slow the pace of monetary policy easing with a quarter-point rate cut, as economic growth cools and core inflation remains stubbornly high.】

item.title: 软银承认与 OpenAI 合作的星际之门项目需要更多时间
item.description: 软银集团（SoftBank Group Corp.）表示，"星际之门"（Stargate）的启动比预期花费的时间要长，并首次承认其在美国与 OpenAI 公司价值 5000 亿美元的人工智能合作正陷入僵局。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. said it’s taking longer than anticipated to get Stargate off the ground, conceding for the first time that the $500 billion artificial intelligence tie-up in the US with OpenAI is bogging down.】

item.title: 克里姆林宫确认峰会计划，乌克兰债券涨幅扩大
item.description: 在克里姆林宫确认俄罗斯和美国领导人会晤计划后，乌克兰美元债券涨幅扩大，重新点燃了人们对莫斯科和基辅之间可能休战的赌注。【原文：Ukraine’s dollar bonds extended gains after the Kremlin confirmed plans for a meeting between the Russian and US leaders, rekindling bets on a potential truce between Moscow and Kyiv.】

item.title: 美国施加压力，印度国营炼油厂暂停购买俄罗斯石油
item.description: 据直接了解印度国有炼油企业采购计划的人士称，印度国有炼油企业目前正在减少对俄罗斯原油的采购，因为华盛顿正通过一系列严厉的关税措施加大对新德里的压力。【原文：India’s state-owned oil refiners are pulling back from purchases of Russian crude for now, according to people with direct knowledge of the companies’ procurement plans, as Washington ratchets up the pressure on New Delhi over the flows with a wave of harsh tariffs.】

item.title: 日本人寿的日本债券票据损失扩大至创纪录水平
item.description: 日本生命保险公司（Nippon Life Insurance Co.）表示，由于担心债务供应增加导致收益率攀升，该公司持有的国内债券未实现损失在三个月内扩大了 5,680 亿日元（39 亿美元），达到创纪录水平。【原文：Nippon Life Insurance Co. said that unrealized losses on its domestic bond holdings widened by ¥568 billion ($3.9 billion) in three months to record levels as concern about rising debt supply caused yields to climb.】

item.title: 关税生效，日本下调今年经济增长预期
item.description: 由于美国关税和持续通胀对经济造成的压力，日本下调了本财年的经济增长预期，这使得日本央行的政策路线变得更加复杂，也增加了陷入困境的首相石破茂的压力。【原文：Japan cut its growth forecast for the current fiscal year as US tariffs and persistent inflation weigh on the economy, complicating the policy course of the Bank of Japan and adding to pressure on embattled Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba.】

item.title: 中国央行连续九个月增持黄金
item.description: 中国人民银行在 7 月份增加了黄金储备，这标志着该行连续 9 个月购买黄金，从而使其持有的黄金从美元多样化。【原文：People’s Bank of China increased its gold reserve in July, marking nine straight months of purchases that are helping it diversify its holdings away from US dollars.】

item.title: RRJ Capital 与德意志银行为渤海租赁 10 亿美元贷款再融资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，私人基金 RRJ Capital 和德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）已同意向在中国上市的飞机和集装箱租赁公司渤海租赁有限公司（Bohai Leasing Co.【原文：Private fund RRJ Capital and Deutsche Bank AG have agreed to provide a $550 million loan to Bohai Leasing Co., a China-listed aircraft and container leasing firm, to help partly refinance a $1 billion debt due by the end of the month, according to people familiar with the matter.】
